title: Ep. #141 | Catching Up: VERIVERY's DONGHEON, HOYOUNG, and KANGMIN
description:
Members DONGHEON, HOYOUNG, and KANGMIN from boy group VERIVERY are back at DIVE Studios this time to chat with Eric all about goals for the future including their upcoming US Tour. But how did these three get here? From lost passports to last chance auditions, it's already been a wild journey that has only just started. 

📲 Download MINDSET by DIVE Studios on the app store (for FREE) at https://www.getmindset.com/

🛍 Shop at https://shop.divestudios.io/

💬 If you are fluent in another language, please contribute subtitle translations here:
https://amara.org/en/videos/lNeP4hyza...
